alert.note: Alert for Cocke Smoky Mountains; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 8:19PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cocke and southeastern Sevier Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 918 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, or 12 miles southeast of Gatlinburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gatlinburg, Smoky Mountains-Clingmans Dome, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center, Cosby, Elkmont and Great Smoky Mountains National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cocke Smoky Mountains; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains
